p: Measurement of ATP release of thrombin-activated platelets of the isolated compound 168 was investigated by applying D. S. Kim’s method. Compound 168 exhibited inhibitory activities on ATP release of thrombin-activated platelets with IC 50 value of 57.6 ± 3.2 μM. Staurosporine served as the positive control with IC 50 value of 3.2 ± 0.6 μM [ 51].
